snippet.title: "A Long Journey to an Uncertain End" - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1164830

A Long Journey to an Uncertain End is a narrative-focused space opera management game that’ll have you flying around the universe, assembling an eclectic crew and taking any job you can to keep one step ahead of your abusive ex. The twist: you’re not just piloting a ship...you are the ship.

A game by Crispy Creative
Music by: Jesse Myers (https://www.jessemyers.net/)
Animation by: Particle Beam
